H0.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. Morning Reviver

H1.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. Hangover Helper

H2.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. The Cure

H3.text: What name is given to an alcoholic drink that is taken in an effort to cure a hangover. Hair of the dog

A4.text: Hair of the dog: The belief is that consumption of further alcohol after the onset of a hangover will relieve symptoms, based upon the theory that the hangover represents a form of alcohol withdrawal and that by satiating the body's need for alcohol the symptoms will be relieved.

A5.text: The practice colloquially referred to as 'hair of the dog'—consuming alcohol the morning after excessive drinking—is occasionally cited as a hangover remedy.
